name: The 8th Int’l Conference on Groups and Algebras
content: The 8th Int’l Conference on Groups and Algebras (ICGA 2024) will be held on November 15-17, 2024 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Groups and Algebras. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
